title: [Large-scale] Evaluation and Strategic Utilization of Cloud-based Collaborative Learning Tools

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and understanding of online collaboration tools
context.additional_context: Learner roles (student/job seeker), domain expertise (intermediate), subject area (language), assessment method (project-based), technological environment (digital devices provided).

learning_goals: Learners can analyze cloud-based collaborative tools by applying the five evaluation criteria (usability, functionality, visual communication, learning design, security).
Learners can improve learning outcomes by visualizing idea documentation and collaboration processes among team members (bubble diagrams/text outlines).
Based on the evaluation results of collaborative tools, learners can establish practical strategies applicable to team project design.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
